article_text:
President Obama set as one of his political goals the restoration of trust in government, so seven years later how’s that working out? Not good. Not even bad. We’re talking historically awful.

That’s the news from the latest Pew Research survey that asked some 6,000 Americans about their views of the federal government. Only 19% of Americans say they trust the government to do what is right “just about always” (16%) or “most of the...

twitter.description: Donald Trump’s Secret Weapon: A new study finds trust in government hits an all-time low, says a Wall Street Journal editorial.
twitter.title: Donald Trump’s Secret Weapon

article_summary:
Only 19% of Americans say they trust the government to do what is right “just about always” (16%) or “most of the...
President Obama set as one of his political goals the restoration of trust in government, so seven years later how’s that working out?
That’s the news from the latest Pew Research survey that asked some 6,000 Americans about their views of the federal government.
We’re talking historically awful.
Not even bad.
